name: Research Paper on Cognitive Psychology
description: Write a 10-page research paper on a topic in cognitive psychology, including at least 8 scholarly sources.

name: Chapter 5 Reading Quiz
description: Quiz covering material from Chapter 5: Learning and Memory

name: Calculus Problem Set 8
description: Complete problems 1-25 from textbook chapter 8, focusing on integration techniques.

name: Python Programming Project
description: Create a web application using Python Flask framework. Must include database integration and user interface.

name: Algorithm Analysis Lab
description: Implement and analyze time complexity of sorting algorithms.

name: Argumentative Essay Draft
description: Submit first draft of argumentative essay on climate change policy. Minimum 1500 words.

name: Cell Structure Lab Report
description: Write detailed lab report on cell structure observations using microscopy.

name: World War I Timeline Project
description: Create an interactive timeline of major WWI events with analysis of causes and effects.

name: Midterm Exam Review
description: Complete review questions for midterm exam covering chapters 1-4.

name: Derivatives Quiz
description: Online quiz covering derivative rules and applications.

name: Peer Review Workshop
description: Participate in peer review session for essay drafts.

name: Discussion Post: Renaissance Art
description: Write 300-word discussion post analyzing Renaissance art influences on modern culture.
